Package card

Class MonsterCard

java.lang.Object
card.BaseCard
card.MonsterCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Attackable, Guardable, UseEffectAble
Direct Known Subclasses:
BirdCard, CatCard, DuckCard, GolemCard, KingCard
public abstract class MonsterCard extends BaseCard implements Attackable, Guardable
One type of normal base card
Author:
Wishmeluck
